title: fps drops (patch 6.23)
body: Ever since the patch prior to 6.23 (not sure which it is), I've been having major frame rate drops when multiple champs are on screen. I usually have anywhere from 150-200 fps, but during ganks and team fights it drops to the teens and occasionally the single digits. This often times means that my screen almost completely freezes until enough champs die or retreat, and by the time it catches up I'm already dead. This has never (to my memory) happened before that patch. Any idea what caused it or when it might be fixed?

replies.body:
For anyone still having problems with FPS issues I have solved mine. I downloaded and used Display Driver Uninstaller in safe mode to remove my nvidia drivers. I then downloaded Nvidia Driver version 375.70 and ONLY installed the Driver and Physx and unchecked all other boxes. After performing a clean install I had to set tune 2 settings in my Nvidia control panel. I made sure Single Display and Maximum performance were being used. 

After this process I was able to finally play LoL again.

I'm experiencing heavy fps drops too. Mostly game is running fine but sometimes fps can drop to 10-15 or screen can completely freeze for a fraction of seconds. Usually it happens when a new object appears on screen: a plant, enemy champions come out of fog of war, etc. Today I have game freezed for about 3 seconds and it never happened before. I already tried updating drivers and even tried to do clean install of the game but it still happens. I have Windows 7 x64, Geforce GTX 650, 4 Gb RAM and AMD FX-6100, all settings set to highest (without inking). It doesn't seem to be related to new client cause it happens with old client too.

There are a lot of factors that could be at play here, and it really depends on your OS and what programs you run in the background. In general, our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) commonly resolves these types of issues, so I'd like you to give those steps a try.

Let me know if this helped.

GTX 970
16 gb ram
I7

Drivers Tested - Nvidia 376.09  WHQL and 375.95

Since patch 6.23 my LoL game will drop to around 5-10 fps near Krugs on either side of the map and mid lane. If there is a team fight or even just a solo fight in these areas on the map the game ALWAYS drops to around 5-10 fps. This only started occurring since patch 6.23 and I have never had **_THIS _**problem before. 

I have repaired, uninstalled and reinstalled to no avail. The same issue is still occurs and LoL is pretty unplayable for me this patch. 

I also play BF1 and Paragon and these games run like butter with no stutters or crashes, so I am always confused why my league client has issues. LoL does not seem like it is as graphically intensive as other games I play yet I always seem to have some sort of issue with LoL. This current issue I am having tho makes the game really unplayable.

Looking for solutions. TY.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Did you work through all the solutions in the FPS guide I linked?

I've had the same problem but my fps stays as a steady 38 no matter what setting I have it on and it use to be well above 150 or 200.  I have a 16 gb ram, gtx 1060, i7, and reinstalled the entire game on to my C Drive (which is my SSD) when originally it was on my HDD which didn't matter prior to patch 6.23.  It still worked great.  And I've followed your guys' entire list of possible remedies (including the common "disabling the GAME BAR" with Windows 10's last update along with some other advices from players) and nothing worked.  It's definitely something with that last patch , cuz I have zero issues on all my other games.  And all my drives are up to date working fine.  Would love to see a fix in the next patch.

If you've updated your drivers, it's possible you may be running one of the newer drivers that have been causing issues for some players. I'd recommend rolling back to driver version **372.90** from [this link](http://www.nvidia.com/download/driverResults.aspx/107564/en-us).

Let me know if this caused any change in your FPS.

Okay, 372.90 does help with the frames, but It still dips a lot. The areas on the map that seem to be causing the FPS drop for me at least are Krugs and Raptors. If you check out Scarra's broadcast from yesterday he is having the same issue I am. It was driving him insane on stream and he kept thinking it was his computer, but that is the same thing that is happening to me.

Edit:
Win 7 64 bit
i7 
16 gb ram
GTX 970

With 372.90 and the legacy client it runs much better but whenever I am around Krugs or Raptors it still drops slightly.

I feel at this point, we'll need to take a look at your system logs to determine what else could be at play here. I'd like you to run a set of system logs using [the HRT](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach the logs file to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our techs can work with you further with this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Whoa that is cool. I will do this. Thank You!

I have the same issue, today I was playing hecarim, and I saw how my fps drops. I play with 200-250 fps and when i'm doing  the blue, my fps drops  because I felt a slowdown on my fps. I hope they can repair this because I have never had that issue with the game before.  
Note: I am playing with the new client alpha.
Anyone has found the solution?
FPS has been dropping for me too. I can run all the latest games, but this one is like barely running now. Even when I turn the graphics down there is no change.

install the newest geforce driver now and see if that was the problem. I am assuming that is my problem. link below talks about how fps was cut in half for some users with last update.
https://www.techpowerup.com/227881/users-report-multiple-issues-with-geforce-375-86-whql-drivers

Same problem here. I played with 100-150 fps since this patch, after when I'm in my lane alone fps drops at 80 and when I fight (as 5v5) drops at 10-20. ARAM (My fav mod) is completely unplayable. Hope Riot will help us or will fix this problem. It's pretty annoying play like this.

I'm seeing the fps drops as game lag...the thing freezes and 4-5 seconds later (sometimes 7) everything gets put back together...

Now, I could see maybe my ISP dropping a packet or two...but this? This is outright buggy behavior.

I also saw something happen where my fps got 'stuck' at 10 until I alt+tabbed in/out of the game. FPS returned to normal...but after that I've been having the game freezes instead.
Same. I didn't see this post and have posted one just like this. I had this problem before but don't remember how I fixed it or if I ever did
Same i had 250 and 300 around Constant now 90-150

Same issue, never happened to me before either. I use to get 180+ fps now its constantly around 60 and drops to around 10 in teamfights
Rito help pls
